sentences.en: A weathercock and an artful person, he spoke a lot of beautiful words to please people.
sentences.cn: 他这个人,见风使舵,八面玲珑,说了不少使大家高兴的话.

sentences.en: Another person says: " Bellyful is the character of artful cheat. "
sentences.cn: 又一人说: “ 满腹都是巧诈之言. ”

sentences.en: Beautiful shape and artful design, easy to take with.
sentences.cn: 外形美观小巧, 方便携带.

sentences.en: Despite some artful editing, the anthology is a weak one.
sentences.cn: 除了编辑上的一些巧妙之处，这本选集乏善可陈。

sentences.en: Even gentle and artful criticism takes courage - a courage I haven't always had.
sentences.cn: 即使是温和而巧妙的批评也需要勇气 —— 一种我不总是具备的勇气.

sentences.en: He is man with artful speech and flashy manners.
He's very artful and usually succeeds in getting what he wants.
sentences.cn: 他很狡诈,往往能如愿以偿.

sentences.en: I am afraid that this looks very artful!
sentences.cn: 看样子这只怕是太藏奸卖乖了!

sentences.en: She's artful and knows how to get round her parents.
sentences.cn: 她很机灵,知道如何劝服她的父母.

sentences.en: Some politicians have realised that there are more artful ways of subduing people than shooting or jailing them.
sentences.cn: 一些政客已经意识到有比枪和监狱更高明的使民众屈服的方法。

sentences.en: That man used artful means to find out secrets.
sentences.cn: 那人使用狡猾的手段获取机密.

sentences.en: The artful Arbaces sought to dazzle the young Neapolitan by his treasures and his eloquence.
sentences.cn: 狡猾的阿耳巴克斯企图用他的珠宝和雄辨的口才来迷惑这位那不勒斯少年.

sentences.en: There is also an artful contrast of shapes.
This false friend began his tale with many artful speeches to the duke.
sentences.cn: 这个不讲信义的朋友先对公爵油嘴滑舌地说了一大套.

sentences.en: You had a particular fancy for me, hadn't you, Old Artful?
sentences.cn: 你这个老滑头,你对我特别有好感是不是?

trans.tran_cn: 巧妙的，狡猾的，有技巧的，人工的
